runs.comm: length delivery outside off, he rises up with the ball and punches it straight to mid-off

swings hard and swings across the line, it flies to the boundary at deep square leg, but this is off the inside edge.. The ball was pitched on off and angling away but that healthy edge takes it to another direction
swing and a miss! KJP sees length and tries to go over the top, but that beats the outside edge
this one comes in from back of length, hits the thigh pad as the batsman looks to nudge it away to the leg side
another swing and a miss! This time, Bhuvi, bowls this a touch wider and KJP immediately goes after it, but it almost kisses the outside edge
straighter this time, the batsman dabs it to mid-off and calls for a quick single

this is gone up in the air! KJP tries to swing again, but he is nowhere near the pitch.. This one was outside off and he tries to pull it off the front foot, only to get a thick leading edge to mid-off where Jadeja takes an easy catch
this one comes from back of the length and the batsman manages to drop it to the right of the slip fielder for a single
back of length delivery on off, Mahela easily clips it to the leg side, for a couple to deep square leg
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends this solidly to the off side
another length delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to point
comes forward and pushes this beautifully to the off side, but hit straight to cover
big outswinger outside off, Dilshan sees room and swings his bat, but finds the man at point
this is swinging in but swinging too much, it's on the pads and easily whipped to the fine-leg boundary
tries a short ball at Dilshan and the batsman thinks about going for a pull, but pulls out at the last moment as this was getting big on him
he bowls it just short of length  and Dilshan punches it straight to cover point
now is this is a wicket? No, Dhoni raises his hands immediately.. The crowd made some noise as they saw the bails flash after Dilshan misses his pull, but that ricocheted off Dhoni's body
keeps it tight on off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off
that is a superb shot! Mahela has played a ramp shot straight over Dhoni's head.. it was a short delivery and he just shows it the way.. Dead straight
back of length delivery on off, the batsman guides this down to third man with ease
marginally short and Dilshan is quick into his position to pull, even though he doesn't get a lot of bat behind it, it is enough to beat the square leg fielder to the boundary
an inside edge this time but the fine-leg is in the circle! Gives Dilshan another boundary.. The batman was looking to blast this through the off, but Dilshan gets a healthy amount of bat on that
he dabs it to cover off the front foot and calls for a quick single
good delivery outside off, but Mahela has no problems in calmly steering it to third man for a single
short and wide, Mahela picks up another single to third man with a neat steer
bowls it slow and the batsman is beaten in his clip shot, it hits the thigh pad and rolls over to the off side
what a touch this one! Dhoni has come up to the stumps and what does Mahela do? he runs it down through the vacant first slip region for a boundary
a top-edge this time as the batsman looks to guide it to the fine leg area, but it takes over straight over the keeper's head.. dead straight again..
fuller and wider outside off, Mahela comes forward and pushes it to cover
play and a miss this time as Mahela chases this wider delivery
pushed through on off, the batsman defends it to cover
slightly shorter and Dilshan takes full toll, slapping it through backward square leg for a boundary
bowls an offspinner outside off, some turn for him, the batsman pushes it to cover
pushed through on the off and middle line, Dilshan pushes it back to the bowler

caught at deep square leg! Indian fielders come back to life as Kohli takes a well-judged catch at the boundary.. Ashwin's carrom-balls brought him a lot of wickets in the last game.. It's that ball again.. Dilshan goes for a sweep and gets a big top-edge.. looks like it's going over, but Kohli is at the boundary to gobble it up.
bowls another carrom-ball, but it's too short and allows Mahela enough time to watch it and defend to off
floated up outside off, Sanga leans forward and drives it to long off
gives this one some air, the batsman comes forward and pushes it calmly to point
tossed up on the middle stump line, Mahela gets behind the line and defends
flatter this time and Mahela again comes forward to defend it to cover
this is the slider now, the batsman goes back and defends it to point
excellent start from Mishra! this one is tossed up on off, Mahela is in no hurry, defends this one to ff
fuller on off, the batsman drives it straight to cover
quicker on the middle stump, the batsman pushes it to midwicket

this is a top-edge from nowhere! The batsman tries to pull a not-so-short ball and gets a thick top edge which just falls short of long off.. Mohit makes an attempt but can't reach.. by the time he picks it up, they take a second
he goes on the back foot and clips it fine on the leg side for a single
fuller on the stumps, Mahela punches it straight to midwicket
slightly shorter, the batsman turns it softly to square leg and scampers back for a second
he tosses it up outside off, but Sanga goes across the line and swats it through backward square leg with a powerful sweep
fuller outside off, pushed straight to cover
this one is flatter, the batsman looks for a single to long on but finds midwicket
he likes the ball coming in to him! Sanga goes down on the knee and smashes it powerfully with wonderful sweep, it goes all the way
full and flighted outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
fires this one on the stump, Mahela comes forward and defends
fuller on the stumps, Sri Lanka happily turn the strike over with a push to long off
he comes down the pitch and punches this to wide long on for another easy single
flatter and slower on off, Sanga goes deep in the crease and punches this to long on calmly
this is Mahela style! He waits an extra second and guides the quicker ball with the finest of late cuts to the boundary..

he is gone! Ashwin takes a good forward-diving catch! Mahela ends his last innings with a cross-batted slog that he is not able to keep down.. The fielder at midwicket takes an excellent catch.. But after that previous shot, this was quite unlike Mahela..
another edge! This is past the slip fielder.. It was a good loopy delivery and Thirimanne goes for a firm push, but that flies past the lone slip fielder, all the way down to the boundary
bowls a full toss on the stumps, Sanga eases it to long on for a single
floated up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to cover
fires this one a touch quicker on the pads, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
flatter from Ashwin again, Sanga goes back and tucks it behind square on the leg side for a single
that was the carrom-ball and I doubt if Thirimanne read it! It was tossed up wide and beats the batsman's drive
fuller delivery on off, the batsman pushes it softly to point for a single
beautifully bowled! the batsman bowls it slow and gets some turn to beat the outside edge
he comes forward and pushes it to long off for a single
tossed up on the stumps, eased to long off for a single
fuller on the stump, Thirimanne finds the cover fielder with his drive
he stays in the crease and has to wait for this to come to him as Raina slows the pace, defends it to off
slower again, the batsman pushes it to midwicket.. Just two runs of that over
the batsman takes a step down the pitch and works the flatter delivery to deep square leg for a quick couple
floated outside off, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover for a single

another one falls! This is going to get exciting folks.. Thirimanne wasn't showing much footwork in the last over and this time he tries to push a slider only to get a thin outside edge to the keeper. That stayed a touch low too
big googly first up! The batsman comes forward to defend and is beaten
quicker slider outside off, the batsman tries to hit this too hard, only manages to chop it to cover
this is the leg spinner now, Thisara cuts it but can't beat the sole man at point
tossed up on off, Sanga calmly pushes it to long off
contrary to Sanga's push, Perera punches this firmly to long off
quicker delivery down the leg side, Dhoni gathers it well but it's a wide
flatter outside off, Sanga goes back and pushes it to long off again
quicker delivery outside off, Perera pushes it straight to extra cover
he dabs it to the front of point fielder and calls for a quick single
slower and wider outside off, Sanga goes back and cuts it to deep point to keep the strike
this is a poor start from Mishra, he bowls this one down the leg side and Dhoni manages to parry it to short fine leg.. Perera wanted to pick up a bye but is sent back in time
fuller delivery, he drives it to wide long on and they take another single
biggie!! That was what he was sent for.. he gets under this tossed up delivery and hammers it over long-on.. this is a huge hit.. That is in to the crowd
a googly follows, but this is short enough for him to cut it to deep cover
another bounday! Mishra falling apart here.. he fires this one on the pads and Sanga smartly shows it the way past short fine leg fielder
beautiful googly! This one beats the outside edge as Sanga comes forward to defend
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman easily pushes it to long off for a single to make it 14 off the over
tossed up on off, the batsman pushes it back to Ashwin
only a little leg sidish and Sanga waits and extra second to clip it fine on the leg side.. Beautifully dabbed, the fine leg fielder is not able to cut it off
tossed up and full, Sanga pushes it back to Ashwin
on the pads again, this time Sanga paddles it to the fielder at fine leg
that's the carrom-ball now, the batsman defends it to midwicket
fired down the leg side, this is too far down
he beats the bat with a flighted delivery outside off as Thisara looks to crash it through cover
tossed up a bit wider outside off and Sanga, this is delightful, he comes down on his knees and drives it over extra cover .. that's a superb shot
fuller on the stumps, the batsman drives it easily down the ground, to long off
another biggie! Thisara is running away.. he sees flight in the ball and he gives it some more.. Whacks this googly over wide long-on ..he is a powerful guy

excellent effort by long-on, but he is not able to catch this one.. The batsman went for another big hit and got a big leading edge straight down the ground.. Rahane ran in and got there, dived, but could not hold on.. That's a drop
fired on the pads and the batsman run for a leg bye
quicker delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to long off for a single
carrom-ball, another edge.. The batsman tries to slog it but the top edge flies over Dhoni and the first slip fielder
on the pads, the batsman looks to sweep and gets an under edge to the fine-leg boundary.. Sanga gets to his half-century.. He gets applauded by the India fielders
slower this time, this one spins past the outside edge
he goes back and crunches this to deep cover for a single
he comes down the pitch and finishes off with a big swipe down the ground
